subject: Super Bowl
Football
lead_paragraph: A Gatorade shower for Giants Coach Bill Parcells in 1985 was actually a form of revenge. In the last 25 years, though, the dousing of the coach has become a winning tradition.
snippet: A Gatorade shower for Giants Coach Bill Parcells in 1985 was actually a form of revenge. In the last 25 years, though, the dousing of the coach has become a winning tradition.
